inclusion.criterion: Pre- and post-pubertal patients who are diagnosed with conditions that necessitate chemo- or radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: wish to preserve their ovarian function
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with acute or chronic conditions that would preclude surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients for whom the primary oncologist and/or pathologist discourage entering the protocol because of specific condition characteristics
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cancers with high risk of ovarian metastasis such as leukemia and non-Hodgkin lymphoma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known positive bone marrow for leukemia or solid tumor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients whose tumor is in an organ that communicates with the peritoneum and peritoneal sampling at time of primary excision shows evidence of disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients older than 40 years of age
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 35-year-old woman with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and fatigue and weakness that affects mainly her upper limbs.
